title: How to Make Spanish Accents on a Dell Computer

steps.title: For accented vowels:
steps.content: For accented vowels: Press Ctrl + ' , then the vowel ( Ctrl + ' + a = á). [1] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source

steps.title: For Ñ:
steps.content: For Ñ: Press Ctrl + ~ , then the letter n ( Ctrl + ~ + n = = ñ). [2] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source

steps.title: Make sure you have the right equipment.
steps.content: Make sure you have the right equipment. These will only work if you have a number keypad on your computer keyboard or and external USB keypad. [3] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source

steps.title: Type the right code.
steps.content: Type the right code. Each character in your computer has a code made up of pressing the ALT key then a three-digit number, all of which are listed below. [4] X Research source á = Alt + 0225 é = Alt + 00233 í = Alt + 00237 ó = Alt + 00243 ú = Alt + 00250 ñ = Alt + 00241 ü = Alt + 00252 ¡ = Alt + 00161 ¿ = Alt + 00191

steps.title: Open Character Map by clicking the Start button.
steps.content: Open Character Map by clicking the Start button. [5] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source

steps.title: In the search box, type Character Map.
steps.content: In the search box, type Character Map. [6] X Research source

steps.title: In the list of results, click Character Map.
steps.content: In the list of results, click Character Map. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Click the Font list, and then click the font you want to use.
steps.content: Click the Font list, and then click the font you want to use.

steps.title: Click the special character you want to insert into the document.
steps.content: Click the special character you want to insert into the document. [8] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source

steps.title: Click Select, and then click Copy.
steps.content: Click Select, and then click Copy. [9] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source

steps.title: Open your document and click the location in the document where you want the special character to appear.
steps.content: Open your document and click the location in the document where you want the special character to appear.

steps.title: Click the Edit menu, and then click Paste.
steps.content: Click the Edit menu, and then click Paste. [10] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source
